sense.def: Pathological Condition Combined Designation of tai yang tou tong 太陽頭痛 , major yang headache; yang ming tou tong 陽明頭痛 , yang brilliance headache; shao yang tou tong 少陽頭痛 , minor yang headache; shao yin tou tong 少陰頭痛 , minor yin headache; tai yin tou tong 太陰頭痛 , major yin headache; jue yin tou tong 厥陰頭痛 , ceasing yin headache. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Li Dong yuan sui zheng yong fan li 李東垣隨證用藥凡 例 quoting Li Dongyuan’s 李東垣 Yong yao xin fa 用藥心法 : 如頭痛須用川芎 writes: 六經頭痛 須用川芎 , “For [a cure of] the six types of conduit-specific headache one must use chuan xiong ”.
